name: Bodega Dash
description:
Get In! Get Out! 

Grab all your groceries and place them in your cart before time runs out and the store closes in this grocery shopping-inspired physics game! Who cares if you make a mess?

This is a collaboration between Camron Gonzalez, Jon Talbot, Leslie Zeng, MD.Huynh, and Sophie Chu.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Camera - Mouse

Grab - Left Mouse Click

Esc - Pause

BGM & Soundtrack Credits

Yoshi's Island - Overworld [Remix]

kiddpark - Cash Register

JanevdMerwe1995 - Trolley over floor
